snippet: The claims relate to some of the search giant’s online advertising tools and parts of its search business linked to online shopping....
abstract: European Union antitrust regulator Margrethe Vestager announces new set of antitrust charges against Google, saying some of firm's advertising products restricted consumer choice; Google has denied wrongdoing in two previous European antitrust charges.

byline.original: By MARK SCOTT and JAMES KANTER

lead_paragraph: The claims relate to some of the search giant’s online advertising tools and parts of its search business linked to online shopping.

headline.main: Google Faces New Round of Antitrust Charges in Europe
headline.print_headline: Europe’s Antitrust Regulator Levels a New Round of Charges Against Google
